Standard.Name: [Fams mods] Enbesan Flora: Rerun trigger: intermediate moderate 4.2
[Fams mods] Enbesa Plateau Botanical Set

English.Text: Enbesa Plateau

Standard.Name: [Fams mods] Enbesa Plateau Botanical Set Description

English.Text: The monsoons sweeping across the highlands of the Enbesan plateau create an unexpected landscape rich in unique flora, and may encourage your farmers to add colour and variety to their fields.

Standard.Name: [Fams mods] Enbesa Plateau Set Buff

English.Text: Enbesa Plateau

Standard.Name: [Fams mods] Enbesa Plateau Botanical Set Description

English.Text: The variety of flora in the Enbesan Pleateau exhibit of your botanical gardens has encouraged your farmers to grow beautiful and non-indigenous varieties of flowers alongside their crops.

Standard.Name: [Fams mods] Rift Valley Botanical Set

English.Text: Rift Valley

Standard.Name: [Fams mods] Rift Valley Botanical Set Description

English.Text: The arid savannah of Enbesa's Rift Valley provides a home to many sturdy varieties of plants. Their heartiness in difficult conditions may reveal secrets that make tending all of your plants easier.

Standard.Name: [Fams mods] Rift Valley Set Buff

English.Text: Rift Valley

Standard.Name: [Fams mods] Rift Valley Botanical Set Description

English.Text: Studying the tough plants from Enbesa's arid savannah teach your botanists ways to improve the health and beauty of other exhibits in your botanic gardens.

Standard.Name: [Fams mods] Bountiful Branches Botanical Set

English.Text: Bountiful Branches

Standard.Name: [Fams mods] Bountiful Branches Botanical Set Description

English.Text: These trees are the life of Enbesa, providing both valuable timber and a selection of native fruits. A grand display of these may inspire your craftspeople.

Standard.Name: [Fams mods] Bountiful Branches Set Buff

English.Text: Bountiful Branches

Standard.Name: [Fams mods] Bountiful Branches Botanical Set Description

English.Text: The different types of wood displayed in Bountiful Branches have inspired your craftspeople with new techniques to working with wood.

Standard.Name: [Fams mods] Jewels of the South Botanical Set

English.Text: Jewels of the South

Standard.Name: [Fams mods] Jewels of the South Botanical Set Description

English.Text: Enbesa's trade partners to the far south have a dazzling array of colourful and exotic plants. Having such bright displays in your gardens may encourage your sailors to improve your trade routes.

Standard.Name: [Fams mods] Jewels of the South Set Buff

English.Text: Jewels of the South

Standard.Name: [Fams mods] Jewels of the South Botanical Set Description

English.Text: Upon seeing the beautiful Jewels of the South display in your botanic gardens, your sailors become more eager to expand your trade routes, pushing your trade ships to their limit.

Standard.Name: Tree Fuchsia (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Tree Fuchsia

Standard.Name: item fluff Tree Fuchsia (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Halleria Lucida. A haven for birds on the highlands plateau, its immature fruit is also used by shepherds as a traditional medicine.

Standard.Name: Torch Lily (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Torch Lily

Standard.Name: item fluff Torch Lily (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Kniphofia Foliosa. The glowing flowers shoot up like a dazzling torch, attracting bees to its copious nectar.

Standard.Name: Lion's Ear (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Lion's Ear

Standard.Name: item fluff Lion's Ear (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Leonotis Ocymifolia. A sturdy specimen with odd-looking tubular flowers is a distant relative of many of the herbs used in the Old World.

Standard.Name: Adey Flower (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Adey Flower

Standard.Name: item fluff Adey Flower (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Bidens Macroptera. The holy flower of Tabourime that blooms to signal the coming of the new year, the Adey flower symbolises prosperity and good fortune for all who wear it.

Standard.Name: Desert Rose (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Desert Rose

Standard.Name: item fluff Desert Rose (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Adenium Obesum. The desert rose blooms in bright pink only in the perfect conditions. Its stem contains poisons that have been long used by the people of Enbesa for hunting and fishing.

Standard.Name: Old Wanza Tree (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Old Wanza Tree

Standard.Name: item fluff Old Wanza Tree (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Cordia Africana. Used not just for construction, but also for fine crafting, the sturdy wanza tree's timber is the heart of Enbesa.

Standard.Name: Frankincense (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Frankincense

Standard.Name: item fluff Frankincense (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Boswellia Papyrifera. The boswellia tree's resin has been long favoured as an incense.

Standard.Name: Aloe (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Aloe

Standard.Name: item fluff Aloe (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Aloe Elegans. No drought will stop this little plant from flourishing, although finding it with flowers atop its red-toothed leaves is more of a treat.

Standard.Name: Wild Custard Apple (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Wild Custard Apple

Standard.Name: item fluff Wild Custard Apple (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Annona Senegalensis. "First came those tropical pine apples and now another? Such a strange taste, but not unpleasant!

Standard.Name: Calla Lily (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Calla Lily

Standard.Name: item fluff Calla Lily (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Zantedeschia Aenbesica. Despite the 'lily' misnomer, this beautiful plant is temperamental yet majestic. Its elegant flowers are unmistakable.

Standard.Name: Royal Poinciana (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Royal Poinciana

Standard.Name: item fluff Royal Poinciana (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Delonix Regia. Commonly said to be the 'flamboyant tree', you can often see their bright red flowers lining the edges of roads.

Standard.Name: Spur Flower (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Spur Flower

Standard.Name: item fluff Spur Flower (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Plectranthus Coerulescens. This shrub blankets the land, bursting into flower late in the year with in pale flowers and fragrant leaves.

Standard.Name: Leopard Orchid (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Leopard Orchid

Standard.Name: item fluff Leopard Orchid (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Ansellia Africana. Sometimes the dark leopard spots may seem to take over the flower, but the striking resemblance to a leopard remains clear.

Standard.Name: Gazania (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Gazania

Standard.Name: item fluff Gazania (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Gazania Rigens. It's suggested that the petals taste like butter, leading to its other nickname 'the butter flower', although we don't recommend it on your toast.

Standard.Name: Cape Periwinkle (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Cape Periwinkle

Standard.Name: item fluff Cape Periwinkle (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Catharanthus Roseus. Leave their farmland unattended for a short while and a shepherd will come to find a spread of 'Bright eyes' periwinkles as their new neighbours.

Standard.Name: Ironwood Olive Tree (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Ironwood Olive Tree

Standard.Name: item fluff Ironwood Olive Tree (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Olea Capensis. One of the world's hardest woods, the hardwood has been used for art and decorative artifacts for centuries, with a regular harvest of olives.

Standard.Name: Moringa Tree (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Moringa Tree

Standard.Name: item fluff Moringa Tree (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Moringa Stenopetala. Every part of this tree is useful in Enbesa; leaves prepared like cabbages, seeds made into a useful oil, young pods are boiled, even the flowers are eaten.

Standard.Name: Warka Tree (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Warka Tree

Standard.Name: item fluff Warka Tree (Fam's Enbesa Flora mod)

English.Text: Ficus Vasta. This huge load-bearing ficus' trunk splits into spreading branches, providing figs enjoyed by children and grazed by animals.

Standard.Name: Culture - Enbesan Plants - Common
Culture - Enbesan Plants - Uncommon
Culture - Enbesan Plants - Rare
Culture - Enbesan Plants - Epic
Culture - Enbesan Plants - Legendary
